recaps.classic_pastor: In John 1:1-18 and Psalm 1, the Lord calls you into Beginning with the Word. Receive this word with humility, and let it shape your next faithful step.
recaps.gen_z: Today is John 1:1-18 plus Psalm 1, and the vibe is Beginning with the Word. Keep it real with God and move different because His word just met you here.
recaps.poetic: From John 1:1-18 to Psalm 1, the melody of Beginning with the Word lingers in your spirit. Walk softly today, carrying this light into every ordinary moment.
recaps.coach: Today's reps were John 1:1-18 and Psalm 1. The focus is Beginning with the Word. Keep it simple: choose one clear action and follow through before the day ends.
recaps.scholar: Reading John 1:1-18 alongside Psalm 1 highlights Beginning with the Word as both doctrine and discipleship. Integrate the truth by connecting interpretation with lived obedience.
